abstract.text: Calculates the double-precision element-wise division of a vector and a scalar value.

inlineContent.text: This function calculates the element-wise division of vector

media-4337203.alt: A diagram showing the operation of this function. There are three rows. The top row represents the input vector A with three boxes, and the scalar value B with one box. The middle row represents the operation as three boxes with division signs. The bottom row represents the output vector C as three boxes. The diagram has connecting lines from the input vectors to the operation, and from the operation to the output vector.
